Description:
Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using the PowerShell Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity Using Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%Get-LocalGroupMember %' and (command like '%domain admins%' or command like '% administrator%' or command like '% administrateur%' or command like '%enterprise admins%' or command like '%Exchange Trusted Subsystem%' or command like '%Remote Desktop Users%' or command like '%Utilisateurs du Bureau Ã  distance%' or command like '%Usuarios de escritorio remoto%'))
